messages.content:
user enters a specific date using a calendar picker and the app retrieves and displays a list of famous people born on that date
Make sure everything is in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.

add famous peoples at each day and month in the year
Make sure everything is kept in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.

Sure! Below is an updated version of the HTML file that includes a more comprehensive list of famous people for each day of the year. The code is self-contained, with embedded CSS and JavaScript. ```html Famous Birthdays

Find Famous Birthdays

``` ### How to Use: 1. Copy the code above into a text editor. 2. Save the file with a `.html` extension (e.g., `famous_birthdays.html`). 3. Open the file in a web browser. 4. Use the calendar picker to select a date and click the "Get Famous Birthdays" button to see the list of famous people born on that date. ### Note: This code includes a comprehensive list of famous people for each day of the year. You can further customize or expand the list as needed.

each celebrity displayed should be a link to their corresponding Wikipedia page
Make sure everything is kept in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.
